remarks: The projective map of the join of an atom with a lattice element. (Contributed by NM, 12-May-2012.)
statement:
pmapjat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapjat.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
pmapjat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pmapjat.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapjat.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
pmapjat2 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Q e. A ) -> ( M ` ( Q .\/ X ) ) = ( ( M ` Q ) .+ ( M ` X ) ) ) $.
